author: Pavan Dahat
text:
Three members of the outlawed Communist Party of India (Maoist) were killed in a gunfight with the police in Dantewada on Wednesday.

“A team of Reserve Guard rushed to the Metapal forest. A gunfight broke out. Three bodies of Maoists were recovered,” IGP S.R.P. Kalluri said.
title: Three Maoists gunned down
